attributes.action: we want to abolish knife crime in Bolton. We need more security in public areas
attributes.background: We want the government to put more security in public areas for example schools,bus stations and train station. We can do this by adding x-ray machines that will detect if somebody is carrying a knife or not.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local law enforcement, including prevent knife crime, are a matter for the local police force, not the UK Government or Parliament.
